item.title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
item.description:
The Sustaining of Church Officers by President Thomas S. Monson, First Counselor in the First Presidency given in the Saturday Morning session of the 177th Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2007
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
